title: Planning a vacation in Goa? Radisson now has a new resort in Mandrem
description: Radisson Hotel Group unveiled the Mandrem Beach Resort in Goa, a new addition to their Radisson Individual Retreats collection. The resort offers beachfront and riverfront accommodations about 28 km from Manohar International Airport. With luxury suites, proximity to popular beaches, and a range of activities, the resort aims to provide a unique and memorable stay for guests seeking a cultural escape in Goa.
